mapper.update: update tt_news set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, digest = #{digest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_on = #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, thumb_url = #{thumbUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select media_id, title, digest, url, created_on, updated_on, type, thumb_url, content from tt_news

select media_id, title, digest, url, thumb_url, created_on, updated_on, type, content from tt_news where 1=1
and (title like CONCAT("%",#{searchStr},"%") or content like CONCAT("%",#{searchStr},"%"))
order by created_on desc
